Need to install the SeuratData package for the vignette/tutorial. We're using it
just because it has accessible datasets with classifications (stored in the Seurat 
metadata field!). Let us know if you have any issues accessing the data needed
for this tutorial.
```{r setup}
library(lionmap)
library(SeuratData)
InstallData("pbmc3k")
data("pbmc3k")
```

Make a tree that assumes 
```{r}
pbmc3k
```
